parameters: \N<Rozaro>...What's wrong, Segi-san? Are you feeling unwell?
\N<Segi>N...No...I'm fine. There's nothing wrong... Shall we go?

She lied. It can't be that there's nothing wrong. Surely,
Rozaro-san must have sensed it too.

By tomorrow... the adverse effects of that aphrodisiac will
once again visit my body.

\N<Segi>To learn about his past, we might need to start by finding
someone who knows about it.

\N<Segi>How about Zuuteruka... He's the one who invited Zozoie to
this training session, so he might know something.

\N<Segi>But... I can hardly imagine he would readily tell me, his
next opponent in the match.

\N<Segi>That leaves... the jailer soldiers of Ryuda. If they brought
Zozoie here, they might know something about his
circumstances...

\N<Segi>Or maybe... I'll have to try and coax it out of the man
himself...

\N<Segi>Yes, I was intruding. But it's nothing important, so please
don't mind me.

\N<Irime>Ah, it's just that recently... my daughter, Rame, she's been
looking so gloomy. I'm worried something might have happened
to her. But you know, right now I'm... well, I've got my
hands full, haha.

\N<Segi>It's worrying indeed... Understood, leave it to me. I'll
casually ask Riia about it soon.
\N<Irime>Really? That would be a big help.
\N<Segi>No problem, it's the least I can do.
\N<Irime>It's just... overwhelming. I'm such a failure as a mother...

\N<Ryuda Soldier>During the training assembly, the comings and goings of you
residents are restricted. Consequently, we cannot let anyone
without permission out.

\N<Man>Ever since those Ryuda guys started stationing in this town,
the future's been uncertain, but you're safe, right? After
all, Yuia is someone you can rely on.

\N<Man>Ever since those Lyuda guys started stationing in this town,
the future's been uncertain, but you can rest easy. After
all, Yuia is someone you can rely on.

\N<Hojiko's Wife>Oh, if it isn't Segi. Actually, I'm going to be away from
home for a few days on some urgent business.

\N<Hojiko's Wife>Please make sure not to give my husband any suggestive looks
while I'm gone, okay? After all, you seem like you have all
sorts of tricks to bewitch men.

\N<Hojiko's Wife>Oh, if it isn't Segi. Actually, I'm going to be away from
home for a few days on some personal business starting
today.

\N<Hojiko's Wife>Please make sure not to give my husband any suggestive looks
while I'm gone, okay? After all, you seem like you have all
sorts of tricks to bewitch men.

\N<Hojiko's Wife>Oh, if it isn't Segi. Actually, I'm going to be away from
home for a few days starting today on some personal
business.

\N<Hojiko's Wife>Please make sure not to give my husband any suggestive looks
while I'm gone, okay? After all, you seem to have quite the
knack for leading men astray.
